channel.title: Looking for Development team. [317]
channel.description:
Ok, so I made this post but it ended up being way to long... If you would like to view the original post, scroll down.
[size=18pt]Shortend Version:[/size]
We need...
Web designer ---OPEN---- Coder1 --Me-- Coder2 --Open-- Coder3 --OPEN-- Modeler --OPEN-- Hoster --OPEN-- Graphic designer --OPEN--
The format I would like you to use....
[size=10pt]What can you code? ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1. 2. 3. 4. ect.
What would you like to learn? ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1. 2. 3. ect.
How long have you been Coding Rsps? (Be honest) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1. (Ex: 3 years)
How old are you? (optional) 1. (EX: 16)
Time Zone? ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1. (EX: Usa eastern)
E-mail? ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1. (ex: mexokisee@gmail.com)
Do you believe Knowledge > Rep? ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1. (yes/no)
Do you want to Develope for Romscape? (my server) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1. (yes/no)
What Position do you want? ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1. (EX: Coder, Hoster, modeler, graphic designer, web designer)[/size]
Im letting this post run for 11 days. On July 20th I will release who got staff, and who didnt.
[code]Ok, so i have been working on this server for a while now.
Unfortunatly, i cant do everything so I would like to start my own team of developers.
Rules: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1. You must contribute. [center]Contribution guide-lines[/center] Example of a good contribution ----------------------------------------------------- If someone on our dev team, is making quest. I consider that, a good contribution. (even if it takes them a week or two)
Example of not contributing ----------------------------------------------------- I do not consider spawning 5 npc's a contribution. (especialy if this is once a week).
2. Follow server, and forum rules. [size=8pt]Thats pretty self explainatory.[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I do not expect you to be able to get on the server every day of every week. BUT I do expect you to log-in one time each month, unlesss you notify me of leave.
Anyone that is on the development team, and decides to leave will be put into Retired-Developer on forums, and on the game.
Im going to be honest and tell you what I can do. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I can make...
Npc's
Shop's
Commands (teleport, get item)
Renaming spell book
Alter locations (Home, teleports, portals)
I can create portals
Create Dialogs
Things I am learning how to do. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Make quest
Make customs
Make a webclient <--- Having lots of trouble with this one. >.>
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
All developers will get admin rights on forums. ( title will be developer, but you can do everything an admin can do )
The exeption to this is that, if you decide to leave the development team you will lose all admin rights. You will get regular player rights.
Things I would like help with. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Making new areas for players.
Making more customs.
Adding new dialogs
Making new quest's.
Makng a web-client.
I also want to make new Pvp, Funpk, and Mini-games for the server.
Hosting a server. (not completly neccissary as we can alwyas buy one)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
All Donations to the server will be divided evenly once all fees are paid off. ( Hosting, website, ect.)
For Temporary website, Pm me.
Any questions, about what I can do, what I want you to do, or anything else just Pm me or email me at... Mexokisee@hotmail.com
Leaving Saturday to go on vacation. Leaving thread alone for one week, Then I will notify any or all who wish to be apart of a new server, and wants to make some money.
Almost forgot...
The format I would like you to use....
What can you code? ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1. 2. 3. 4. ect.
What would you like to learn? ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1. 2. 3. ect.
How long have you been Coding Rsps? (Be honest) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1. (Ex: 3 years)
How old are you? (optional) 1. (EX: 16)
Time Zone? ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1. (EX: Usa eastern)
E-mail? ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1. (ex: mexokisee@gmail.com)
Do you believe Knowledge > Rep? ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1. (yes/no)
Do you want to Develope for Romscape? (my server) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1. (yes/no)
What Position do you want? ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1. (EX: Coder, Hoster, modeler, graphic designer, web designer)
Using the above format shows you can listen and complete simple task's.
The Development team has 7 spots open.
Web designer ---OPEN---- Coder1 --Me-- Coder2 --Open-- Coder3 --OPEN-- Modeler --OPEN-- Hoster --OPEN-- Graphic designer --OPEN-- [/code]
Thanks all who submit- Sriahciboon

item.title: Looking for Development team. [317]
item.dc:creator: @sriahciboon sriahciboon
item.description:
@sriahciboon wrote:

Ehh, I wish they had spoiler’s on mopar so i could shorten it down.

Well, i guess im going to edit it real quick.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for Development team. [317]

item.description:
@wesleyscape wrote:

your not going to get anyone cuz that post was so long. i stoped reading after what people have to contribute lol

item.description:
@sriahciboon wrote:

Ok, so I made this post but it ended up being way to long…
If you would like to view the original post, scroll down.

[size=18pt]Shortend Version:[/size]

We need…

—OPEN----

Im letting this post run for 11 days.
On July 20th I will release who got staff, and who didnt.

[code]Ok, so i have been working on this server for a while now.

Unfortunatly, i cant do everything so I would like to start my own team of developers.

Rules:

1. You must contribute.
[center]Contribution guide-lines[/center]
Example of a good contribution
-----------------------------------------------------
If someone on our dev team, is making quest. I consider that, a good contribution. (even if it takes them a week or two)

Example of not contributing
-----------------------------------------------------
I do not consider spawning 5 npc's a contribution. (especialy if this is once a week).

2. Follow server, and forum rules.
[size=8pt]Thats pretty self explainatory.[/size]

I do not expect you to be able to get on the server every day of every week.
BUT I do expect you to log-in one time each month, unlesss you notify me of leave.

Anyone that is on the development team, and decides to leave will be put into Retired-Developer on forums, and on the game.

Im going to be honest and tell you what I can do.


I can make...

Npc's

All developers will get admin rights on forums. 
( title will be developer, but you can do everything an admin can do )

The exeption to this is that, if you decide to leave the development team you will lose all admin rights.
You will get regular player rights.

Things I would like help with.

Making new areas for players.

Making more customs.

Adding new dialogs

Making new quest’s.

Makng a web-client.

I also want to make new Pvp, Funpk, and Mini-games for the server.

Hosting a server. (not completly neccissary as we can alwyas buy one)


All Donations to the server will be divided evenly once all fees are paid off. ( Hosting, website, ect.)

For Temporary website, Pm me.

Any questions, about what I can do, what I want you to do, or anything else just Pm me or email me at...
Mexokisee@hotmail.com

Leaving Saturday to go on vacation.
Leaving thread alone for one week, Then I will notify any or all who wish to be apart of a new server, and wants to make some money.

Almost forgot...

The format I would like you to use....

What can you code?
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1.
2.

4.
ect.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

ect.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Using the above format shows you can listen and complete simple task's.

---OPEN----
